attributes.action: Approach teaching unions so that teachers take their training days during their holiday time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Teachers get on average thirteen weeks holiday a year, most workers on average get 21 days holiday amounting to three weeks.
We have to take on average 5 days a year of to look after children leaving only 16 days including about 5 for Christmas leaving only eleven days for any holiday time as a family.
Seeing as schools frown upon us taking our children out of school during term time to take advantage of cheaper breaks it is only fair that teachers should also sacrifice a bit of their time .
